jeus.jms.server.mbean

Interface JMSClientResourceMBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    jeus.management.j2ee.J2EEManagedObjectMBean, jeus.management.j2ee.StatisticsProvider

    @Description(value="JMS \uc2dc\uc2a4\ud15c\uc5d0 \uc5f0\uacb0\ub41c \ud074\ub77c\uc774\uc5b8\ud2b8 \ub9ac\uc18c\uc2a4\ub97c \uad00\ub9ac\ud558\ub294 MBean\uc774\ub2e4.")
public interface JMSClientResourceMBean
extends jeus.management.j2ee.StatisticsProvider, jeus.management.j2ee.J2EEManagedObjectMBean
    JMS 시스템에 연결된 클라이언트 리소스를 관리하는 MBean이다.

    RE는 Remote Entry, LE는 Local Entry를 나타낸다.

    변경된 API

    getHost(), getPort() --> getRemoteAddress()
